subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] For Stefan or anyone else interested !!!
author: Ron Lederer
full_text:
--0-821542702-1205689477=:88924
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Hi stefan   I checked out the evpuk site but can't get the download.  Not sure of the unzip process but I think I should be able to handle the download at my end.  Any other options.  I am in Mexico and can't seem to get reliable radio signals with my RS hacks.  Maype a computer based program like evpuk might be my best option.  Ron l

Stefan Bion <yahoogroups@...> wrote:          Thanks Ralph, I know this program, it can be downloaded from
http://www.evpuk.com/evp_assistant_information.html and it's a noise
generator which can play up to 5 prerecorded sounds simultaneously. The
spiricom noise sounds a bit different than the one I had created by
simply mixing the 13 frequencies (131, 141, 151, 241, 272, 282, 292,
302, 415, 443, 515, 653, 701 Hz); obviously not all of the tones have
the same level, and some vary constandly. I have a copy of the original
Spiricom tape on which the sound of the voices can be heard. It's a
robotic like sound and it reminds me of Vocoder voices, or voices made
with these speech aid devices for people with larynx cancer (dunno the
technical term for these devices).

Stefan

-- 

> Hi Stefan,

> I have a program I got off the internet called "EVP Assitant"that has 
> has the 13 tones of the old Spiricom Mk-4 system and it also has whiye 
> noise and pink noise and a water fall audio files on it. IT'S A FREE 
> PROGRAM !!! So it might be of use in this itc group research. I 
> thought I should pass that along if anyone wants a great little 
> proggie. If it's free it's for me LOL. Just do a Google on EVP 
> Assitant then you should find it easily. You could record the tones to 
> a CD and use it that way or whatever. Well you all take care. Keep up 
> the great research.

> Regards,

> Ralph the Ghost Hunter
> S.P.I.R.I.T. Paranormal Investigation Team of Central PA.

> ------------------------------------

> Yahoo! Groups Links
